ModMetaData.name: Rimworld: Medieval Edition
ModMetaData.author: Bonehead14
ModMetaData.description: Rimworld: Medieval Edition, removes all forms of industrial (and above) tier tech. Removing guns, High-tier Research topics, electicity, etc. All factions, raiders and pirates have Neolithic weaponry only. Perfect for those of you who wish for the ultimate medieval edition of rimworld.
